name: PRQLProyect
description:
Glitches have invaded the grid and its your job to stop them, you are only with you arm cannon and the glitches don't respect the grid.

Clean the grid and you win!

Now this game is still in development and its a rough draft from what its intended to be, it my first time using the Godot engine and I'm loving it, and happy with this being my first challenge of a game a week
